China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2023 年 12 月 27 日星期三 01:36:49 GMT 120
Oil prices fall as major shipping firms return to Red SeaOil prices fell in early Asian trade on Wednesday, trimming strong gains from the previous session as major shipping firms began returning to the Red Sea despite continued attacks and escalating tensions in the Middle East. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 01:33:11 GMT NLPZSTZSPNN3FBC2JBK2XADV4M https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/oil-prices-fall-major-shipping-firms-return-red-sea-2023-12-27/Reuters商业活力
Tesla to roll out revamped Model Y version from Shanghai plant - Bloomberg NewsElectric vehicle maker Tesla Inc is preparing to launch a revamped version of its Model Y from its Shanghai plant, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 00:24:48 GMT 7QDTEERGVBM5XLEP65WD2FBUUM https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/tesla-roll-out-revamped-model-y-version-shanghai-plant-bloomberg-news-2023-12-27/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Canada ready to pay settlements to two men imprisoned in China in 2018 - reportCanada's government is willing to sign off on multimillion-dollar settlement packages for Canadians Michael Spavor and Michael Kovrig to compensate them for the near three years they were incarcerated in Chinese prisons, the Globe and Mail reported on Tuesday, citing government sources. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 14:33:53 GMT QSOZAIEKSZILJHAUS5CBERX54U https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canada-ready-pay-settlements-two-men-imprisoned-china-2018-report-2023-12-26/Reuters世界美洲
US extends tariff exclusions on some Chinese categories till May 31The office of U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai on Tuesday announced a further extension of China "Section 301" tariff exclusions on 352 Chinese import and 77 COVID-19-related categories till May 31, 2024. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 13:18:33 GMT TAOR57STANJ7BE6PKUENG2AC3A https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-extends-tariff-exclusions-some-chinese-categories-till-may-31-2023-12-26/Kanishka Singh世界美国
Xi vows to prevent anyone 'splitting Taiwan from China'President Xi Jinping vowed on Tuesday to resolutely prevent anyone from "splitting Taiwan from China in any way", the official Xinhua news agency reported, a little more than two weeks before Taiwan elects a new leader. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 13:02:41 GMT CGX7UKC55FPDXOY7WCXTZCX32E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/xi-vows-prevent-anyone-splitting-taiwan-china-2023-12-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
Taiwan expands Russian sanctions to stop tech being used for weaponsTaiwan's economy ministry said on Tuesday it had expanded a list of sanctioned goods for Russia and its ally Belarus in response to Russia's invasion of Ukraine to prevent Taiwanese high-tech goods from being used for military purposes. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 11:31:34 GMT S5O5SL6PTVL2HACBKG5MZTSHH4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-expands- Russian-sanctions-stop-tech-being-used-arms-2023-12-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
